level.text: 520.1 Each applicant for certification as a Paramedic shall submit anpplication to the Director. The application shall include:
A copy of a valid NREMT Paramedic certification card;
A copy of a valid AHA Health Care Provider (or equivalent) CPR card;
A copy of a valid AHA ACLS card;
A completed application signed by the sponsoring EMS agency’s medicalirector; and
A check or money order made out in the appropriate fee made payable to the.C. Treasurer (if applicable).
520.2 Upon receipt of a complete application, the Director shall review thepplication and, if approved, shall issue a D.C. Paramedic certification card.
